qualifier:
Unprotected write. Non-private method `org.ice4j.ice.Component.free` indirectly writes to field `n$85.org.ice4j.ice.ComponentSocket.component` outside of synchronization.
 Reporting because this access may occur on a background thread.

Note that the prefix path n$85 has been contaminated during the execution, so the reported race on n$85.org.ice4j.ice.ComponentSocket.component might be a false positive.
